scripts.install:all: npm install && cd slack-shared && npm install && cd ../message-listener && npm install && cd ../oauth-callback && npm install && cd ../file-processor && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:listener && npm run build:callback && npm run build:processor
scripts.watch:all: concurrently -n shared,listener,callback,processor 'npm run watch:shared' 'npm run watch:listener' 'npm run watch:callback' 'npm run watch:processor'
scripts.test:all: cd slack-shared && npm test && cd ../message-listener && npm test && cd ../oauth-callback && npm test && cd ../file-processor && npm test
